info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 29 at 3:02PM EST until January 30 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EST TONIGHT... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow for the Winter Storm Warning with additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected resulting in wind chills as low as 15 to 25 below zero. * WHERE...Northern Litchfield and Southern Litchfield Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until midnight EST tonight. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 7 PM this evening to 7 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
